# Seifoddini and Wolfe(1986)
# m = 8 p = 12
# Instance format:
# machines_number parts_number
# machine1 part_to_be_processed_1 part_to_be_processed_2 ...
# machine2 part_to_be_processed_1 part_to_be_processed_2 ...
# ...

8 12

2 1 3 4 5 6 7 10
3 3 4 5 6 7 8 9
4 6 7 8 9 10
5 7 8 9 10
6 7 8 10 11
7 11 12
8 11 12
